form.official-title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to increase from 1 to 2 years the post employment restrictions on Members of the House of Representatives.

section.header: Increase in post employment restrictions for Members of the House of Representatives

subsection.text: Section 207(e)(1) of title 18, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: in the subparagraph heading, by inserting and members of the house of representatives after Senators;
by inserting or a Member of the House of Representatives after who is a Senator; and
by inserting or Member of the House of Representatives after such former Senator; and
in the subparagraph heading, by striking Members and officers and inserting Officers;

clause.text: by striking Any person who is a Member of the House of Representatives or and inserting Any person who is;
by striking such former Member of Congress or and inserting such former;

subsection.text: The amendments made by subsection (a) shall apply to individuals who leave office on or after the date of the enactment of this Act.
